content.text: The following are the characters and cast of NBC's The Office. These characters appear frequently on the show.
Steve Carell as Michael Scott (seasons 1 - 7)
Rainn Wilson as Dwight K. Schrute (seasons 1 - present)
John Krasinski as Jim Halpert (seasons 1 - present)
Jenna Fischer as Pam Beesly (seasons 1 - present)
B.J. Novak as Ryan Howard (seasons 1 - 9)
Ed Helms as Andy Bernard (seasons 3 - present)
James Spader as Robert California (seasons 7 - 8)
Angela Kinsey as Angela Martin (seasons 1 - present)
Leslie David Baker as Stanley Hudson (seasons 1 - present)
Brian Baumgartner as Kevin Malone (seasons 1 - present)
Creed Bratton (actor) as Creed Bratton (seasons 1 - present)
Kate Flannery as Meredith Palmer (seasons 1 - present)
Mindy Kaling as Kelly Kapoor (seasons 1 - present)
Ellie Kemper as Erin Hannon (seasons 5 - present)
Paul Lieberstein as Toby Flenderson (seasons 1 - present)
Oscar Nunez as Oscar Martinez (seasons 1 - present)
Craig Robinson as Darryl Philbin (seasons 1 - present)
Phyllis Smith as Phyllis Lapin (seasons 1 - present)
Zach Woods as Gabe Lewis (seasons 6 - 8)
Amy Ryan as Holly Flax (seasons 4 - 7)
Melora Hardin as Jan Levenson (seasons 1 - 5, 7)
David Denman as Roy Anderson (seasons 1 - 3)
David Koechner as Todd F. Packer (seasons 1 - present)
Andy Buckley as David Wallace (seasons 1 - present)
Rashida Jones as Karen Filippelli (seasons 3 - 7)
Bobby Ray Shafer as Bob Vance (seasons 2 - present)
Catherine Tate as Nellie Bertram (seasons 7 - 9)
Hugh Dane as Hank Tate (seasons 2 - present)
Nancy Walls as Carole Stills (seasons 2 - 3, 7)
Dan Cole as Dan Gore (seasons 2 - 4)
Idris Elba as Charles Miner (season 5)
Devon Abner as Devon (seasons 1 - 2, 4)
Ursula Burton as Hannah Smoterich-Barr (season 3)
Charles Esten as Josh Porter (season 2 - 3)
Patrice O'Neal as Lonnie Collins (seasons 1 - 4)
Karly Rothenberg as Madge
Wayne Wilderson as Martin Nash
Mike Bruner as Tony Gardner
